required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Varied Outreach Methods on Appointment Scheduling, Appointment Completion, and Receipt of COVID-19 Vaccination
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Varied Outreach Methods on Appointment Scheduling, Appointment Completion, and Receipt of COVID-19 Vaccination

brief_summary.textblock: Our objective is to determine the effectiveness of varied outreach methods to children age 12-17 years old who are due for a well child check visit and don't have one scheduled in the next 45 days on the outcomes of appointment scheduling, appointment completion, and receipt of the COVID-19 vaccination.

primary_outcome.description: Appointment completed (yes or no) based on electronic health record documentation

secondary_outcome.description: Appointment scheduled (yes or no) based on electronic health record documentation
COVID-19 vaccine administered (yes or no) based on electronic health record documentation

secondary_outcome.measure: Family member receipt of COVID-19 vaccine
secondary_outcome.description: COVID-19 vaccine administered (yes or no) based on electronic health record

arm_group.description: 2 text or phone reminders that child is overdue for well child check visit

arm_group.arm_group_label: Low tailored message plus COVID-19 vaccine message
arm_group.description: 2 text or phone reminders that child is overdue for well child check visit AND COVID-19 vaccine is available

intervention.description: 2 low tailored text or phone message reminders that child is overdue for well child check visit

intervention.intervention_name: Low tailored message plus COVID-19 vaccine message
intervention.description: 2 low tailored text or phone message reminders that child is overdue for well child check visit and that COVID-19 vaccine is available
intervention.arm_group_label: Low tailored message plus COVID-19 vaccine message

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age 12-17 years
- has not had a well child check in past 365 days
- no appointment scheduled in next 45 days
- parent preferred language = English or Spanish
Exclusion Criteria:
- phone number not available in electronic health record
